BR_text.BRsummary: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'packaging' after installing skorch
BR_text.BRdescription:
I recently installed skorch package. I installed it in a conda virtual environment using the installation guidance with conda:
 <denchmark-code>    git clone https://github.com/skorch-dev/skorch.git
     cd skorch
     python setup.py install
 </denchmark-code>
 
 However, when I run  it throws me the packaging error:
 
 I followed the solution suggested in this <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/hangtwenty/b9820fe204eebb0cc5b9aba49f3c8b22>page</denchmark-link>
 , but I still get the error. I have python 3.7.5 installed under this conda environment and I didn't get this error before installing skorch.

comments_0.comment_text:
Does conda install packaging help?
 Otherwise, can you install skorch from pip? We had a very recent release, so installing from source gives you almost no additional features.

comments_2.comment_text: Thank you for your reply! I used "conda install -c conda-forge skorch" after I posted this issue and it worked.  Unfortunately, I didn't get to try your solution.

comments_3.comment_text: Okay, great that you found a solution.
